sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Login from './Login'; import Register from './Register'; import './css/LandingPage.css'; const LandingPage = () => { return (

Welcome to the Book Club Platform

Discover and join book clubs made by our community and connect with fellow book enthusiasts. Create your own club and manage the readings for your members. Show others the books you appreciate the most. Explore our vast library, add books to your custom list, and display your ratings in your profile for friends to see!

"This platform has rekindled my love for reading!" - Jane Doe

"A fantastic way to connect with other book lovers." - John Smith

"An incredible resource for finding new books." - Sarah Lee

"I love being able to join clubs and discuss my favorite books." - Mark Brown

Join Book Clubs

Connect with like-minded readers.

Create Your Own Club

Start and manage your own book club.

Manage Readings

Organize your reading lists.

Explore Library

Find and add new books.

Custom Book List

Personalize your book collection.

); }; export default LandingPage;
